entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as looking over his shoulder to see Snape sitting on the grass. He is also mentioned as being free to sit down and watch the group under the tree.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as one of the trio who had spent a Sunday finishing their homework.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is also mentioned as one of the trio who had spent a Sunday finishing their homework.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is described as sitting on the grass in the dense shadows of a clump of bushes, immersed in his O.W.L. paper.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is mentioned as pulling out a book and reading.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is described as staring around at the students milling over the grass, looking rather haughty and bored.

entities.name: james
entities.description: James is mentioned as still playing with the Snitch, letting it zoom farther and farther away.

relationships.description: Harry sees Snape sitting on the grass.
Harry is sitting near Lupin, who is reading a book.
Sirius stares around at the students milling over the grass.
